abstract: Editorial urges United States lawmakers to pay attention to the economic failures resulting from decision by British Prime Min David Cameron and his ruling coalition to tackle debt reduction through plan of fiscal austerity; calls austerity political ideology masquerading as economic policy that the US has no need to repeat.
snippet: Deficit reduction based on fiscal austerity has led to a flat-lining economy in Britain. It is the wrong strategy for Britain, and for the United States.
lead_paragraph: Deficit reduction based on fiscal austerity has led to a flat-lining economy in Britain. It is the wrong strategy for Britain, and for the United States.
